title: Pixie Talon
content:
### Formatting Error
The formatting code **png\_alreadyuploaded\_t** does not exist or cannot be used in this context.
author: john_arnst

comments.content: My apologies... there seems to have been some sort of error when I posted this thread... It looked fine when I previewed it.
i have had the same problem in the past. try another format besides png

Greetings everyone!   
   
Well, this is my first post here... Always liked typography, but just started learning to build fonts this last month... I'm primarily self trained so I'm definitely a rookie here and hope to learn alot. I usually work in CG/Pixel illustration. Anyways, enough with the introduction. Here's my first work for critique, and my second font ever:   
   
 ![Pixie Talon Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114653im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/37341.gif)   
   
I hope you're not all tired of extremely small pixel fonts ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114653im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Critique away, please...

Lovely work John, I think the LC p could use some work... not that I know how, as there are no descenders. The "g" works just fine, it's just the "p" that strikes me as odd...   
   
Nice though. Lovely pixel art too!

Lovely work John, I think the LC p could use some work... not that I know how, as there are no descenders. The "g" works just fine, it's just the "p" that strikes me as odd...   
   
Nice though. Lovely pixel art too!

Lovely work John, I think the LC p could use some work... not that I know how, as there are no descenders. The "g" works just fine, it's just the "p" that strikes me as odd...   
   
Nice though. Lovely pixel art too!
